title: Two More Tiny Desks
content:
Speaking of speaking of Tiny Desk Concerts here are two recent good ones. (Eep, wait, theyâ€™re all really good. What if any performance by a very talented performer in an intimate setting is always going to be special?)

Waxahatchee was solo in her 2013 performance, but here she is with an excellent five piece band, including Jeff Tweedyâ€™s son on drums.

And hereâ€™s Doechii with a NINE piece. Gosh, this is so good and so fun to watch.

This is also worth a watch about how the NPR engineers make the concerts sound so good.
